Mr. GREEN of Texas. Mr. Speaker, pursuant to clause 2(a)(1) of rule  IX, I rise to give notice of my intention to raise a question of the  privileges of the House.

The form of the resolution is as follows:

H. Res. 939.…

…H.R. 670, the Lady Liberty Act, bills  originally introduced by Representative Connolly of Virginia, for the  purposes of adding cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to  clause 7 of rule XII.

…framed within its vested powers.''       Every State admitted into the Union since the Constitution       was adopted has been admitted by congressional action       pursuant to this Clause; no State has been admitted pursuant       to a constitutional amendment.

The Supreme Court has broadly construed Congress's assigned       power to admit new states…

…Care for Every Community Act, a bill originally introduced by  Representative Sherrill of New Jersey, for the purpose of adding  cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to clause 7 of rule XII.

…Building FEHB Fairness Act, all  bills originally introduced by Representative Connolly of Virginia, for  the purpose of adding cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to  clause 7 of rule XII.

…framed within its vested powers.''       Every State admitted into the Union since the Constitution       was adopted has been admitted by congressional action       pursuant to this Clause; no State has been admitted pursuant       to a constitutional amendment.

The Supreme Court has broadly construed Congress's assigned       power to admit new states…
